com.revolsys.jts.index.bintree

Class Root

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.jts.index.bintree.NodeBase
      • com.revolsys.jts.index.bintree.Root

  • public class Root
extends NodeBase
    The root node of a single Bintree. It is centred at the origin, and does not have a defined extent.
    Version:
    1.7
